name: RE/MAKE (Demo Day 2 Edition)
description:
This is a demo featuring the training mode of RE/MAKE, which is currently in development. It is still missing many, many features, but in the spirit of Demo Day I am releasing what I have. Please let me know what you think!

If you run into any bugs, please either post them in the current AGDG thread or send me an email at sevivys@gmail.com.

Controls:

  • Z: Jump, Dash (with ↑), Slide (with ↓)
  • X: Attack, Select
  • ←/→: Run left/right
  • ↑/↓: Attack modifiers (hold before pressing X)
